thread.title: A Modern and Family-Friendly Farmhouse — House Call
thread.title_full: A Modern and Family-Friendly Farmhouse — House Call

author: Apartment Therapy Submissions
title: A Modern and Family-Friendly Farmhouse — House Call
text:
Name: Lauren Location: Osgood, Indiana 
We live in a two story modern farmhouse on about five acres of land just outside of a little town with one stoplight, Napoleon, Indiana. My husband and I were both born and raised here and went to the same school. So, we purchased the land and we have been living in our home for just a little over a year. We have three little boys Blake (8), Callen (6) and Nash (2). They are always at the center of our attention and all aspects of our home are created around them first. 
My husband and I both fell in love with the look of the classic gray farmhouse with lots of windows for the exterior and the inside of our home is and open concept. I am the decor enthusiast of the family so my style is poured all throughout our home. A little mid century, eclectic with classic and modern farmhouse touches here and there. However, we both encourage our kids to be creative so we used one entire wall in the boys playroom for a chalkboard wall! I love to tweak our home almost everyday just by rearranging furniture or swapping out decor items from room too room to make each space feel fresh. 
Thanks, Lauren! 
• Interested in sharing your home with Apartment Therapy? Contact the editors through our House Tour & House Call Submission Form .
